level.heading: Statute of limitations.
level.text: An action to recognize a foreign-country judgment must be commenced within the earlier of the time during which the foreign-country judgment is effective in the foreign country or 15 years from the date that the foreign-country judgment became effective in the foreign country.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-86
level.text: For history of Law 19-86, see notes under § 15-361.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 9 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act.
